about_the_game:
Skyrocket your angling progress and treat yourself to a truly deluxe fishing experience with the DELUXE FP PACK! We invested the time and effort to create the perfect set, that includes all the tackle and privileges of the Advanced Pack, plus exclusive and more powerful Deluxe Edition goodies. The DELUXE FP Pack features SEVEN powerful Deluxe Edition rod and reel combos, along with superb Deluxe Edition fishing apparel - an all round basic set of superb equipment to cover all your progressive fishing needs! You also get Pond Passes to 10 FISHING DESTINATIONS, including the states of Missouri, New York, Colorado, North Carolina, Oregon, Florida, Canadian province of Alberta, as well as Czech, Netherlands and Italy! Yep, you get instant 14 DAYS of access to all these locations along with the corresponding Advanced Fishing Licenses! As well as early monster missions unlock!

Deluxe Pack includes:
* 50 000 CREDITS
* 50 BAITCOINS
* 14-DAY PREMIUM
* 5 Marker Buoys
* 2 Storage Boxes (100 Slots)
* 5 Tackle Setups
* 5 Recipe Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* Magfin™ NightFeather™ Deluxe Edition - Length: 6' 6"" (2 m); Lure Weight: 1/28–1/3 Oz. (1–9 g); Power: Ultralight; Line Weight: 3–10 Lb. (1.5–4.5 kg); Action: Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 9
* UL-CHUBER™ AllRound™ Deluxe Edition - Length: 12' 10" (3.9 m); Casting Weight: 1 3/7 – 4 2/7 Oz. (40–120 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 3–11 Lb. (1.5–4.5 kg); Action: Moderate; Pieces: 3+3; Guides: 10+6; Quiver Tips: 1 Oz., 2 Oz., 3 Oz.
* Garry Scott™ DeluxeTroy™ - Length: 23' (7 m); Line Weight: 3–13 Lb. (1.5–6.0 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 7; Guides: 10
* UL-CHUBER™ Deluxe Alli™ - Length: 13' 10" (4.2 m); Casting Weight: 3 1/28 – 6 1/4 Oz. (85–175 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 6.5–18.5 Lb. (3–8.5 kg); Action: Fast; Pieces: 3+3; Guides: 12+6; Quiver Tips: 3 Oz., 4 Oz., 5 Oz.
* Magfin™ LuxCaster™ Deluxe Edition - Length: 7' 3" (2.2 m); Lure Weight: 3/8-1 3/7 Oz. (10–40 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 7.5–23 Lb. (3.5–10.5 kg); Action: Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 10
* RIVERTEX™ Loki™ Deluxe Edition - Length: 8' 10" (2.7 m); Lure Weight: 7/8 – 2 1/2 Oz. (25–70 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 7–26.5 Lb. (4–12 kg); Action: Moderate; Pieces: 2; Guides: 10
* Garry Scott™ Brutus™ Deluxe Edition - Length: 10' 10" (3.3 m); Line Weight: 11–34 Lb. (5–15.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 3; Guides: 14
Reels:
* Magfin™ EspiraSlim™ Deluxe Edition - Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 3/100 (0.25/100), braid 6/125 (0.2/125); Max Drag: 8 Lb. (3.6 kg); Ball Bearings: 12+1; Weight: 7 Oz. (200 g); Drag: front
* UL-CHUBER™ FeederForcer™ Deluxe Edition - Ratio: 4.8:1; Recovery: 32" (81 cm); Capacity: mono 32/120 (0.5/120), braid 30/205 (0.28/205); Max Drag: 10.5 Lb. (4.75 kg); Ball Bearings: 4+1; Weight: 18.5 Oz. (524 g); Drag: front
* Magfin™ EspiraML™ Deluxe Edition - Ratio: 4.7:1; Recovery: 27.5" (70 cm); Capacity: mono 12/100 (0.3/100), braid 20/135 (0.23/135); Max Drag: 12.1 Lb. (5.5 kg); Ball Bearings: 7+1; Weight: 11.5 Oz.; Drag: front
* Magfin™ BigRiver™ Deluxe Edition - Ratio: 6.0:1; Recovery: 47" (120 cm); Capacity: mono 32/120 (0.5/120), braid 30/205 (0.28/205); Max Drag: 18 Lb. (8.15 kg); Ball Bearings: 7+1; Weight: 19 Oz. (545 g); Drag: front
* Magfin™ Counsellor™ Deluxe Edition - Ratio: 6.2:1; Recovery: 29.5" (75 cm); Capacity: mono 12/120 ( 0.3/120), braid 20/160 (0.23/160); Max Drag: 23 Lb. (10.5 kg); Ball Bearings: 10+1; Weight: 9.2 Oz. (260 g); Brake: magnet & centrifugal
* RIVERTEX™ HornetSwarm™ Deluxe Edition - Ratio: 5.0:1; Recovery: 35.5" (90 cm); Capacity: mono 32/120 (0.5/120), braid 30/205 (0.28/205); Max Drag: 24.2 Lb.(11.0 kg); Ball Bearings: 9+1; Weight: 14 Oz. (395 g); Drag: front
* Magfin™ Espira DoublePunch™ Deluxe Edition - Ratio: 4.5:1; Recovery: 27.5" (70 cm); Capacity: mono 32/110 (0.5/110), braid 30/180 (0.28/180); Max Drag: 26.4 Lb. (12 kg); Ball Bearings: 9+1; Weight: 12.5 Oz. (355 g); Drag: rear

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length 1000 yd (1000 m):
Fluoro .009" (0.23 mm) - Test: 8 Lb. (3.6 kg)
Braid .008" (0.2 mm) - Test: 10 Lb. (4.5 kg)
Mono .012" (0.3 mm) - Test: 12 Lb. (5.4 kg)
Braid .0085" (0.22 mm) - Test: 7.7 kg (17 Lb.)
Braid .009" (0.23 mm) - Test: 20 Lb. (9.1 kg)
Fluoro .016" (0.4 mm) - Test: 20 Lb. (9.1 kg)
Mono .018" (0.45 mm) - Test: 25 Lb. (11.3 kg)
* Mono Leaders - Length: 2 yd (2 m):
.006" (0.16)- Test: 7 lb (3.15 kg)
.007" (0.18)- Test: 8.3 lb (3.8 kg)
.008" (0.2) - Test: 9.7 lb (4.4 kg)
.010" (0.25) - Test: 14.3 lb (6.5 kg)
* Bobbers: Glowing Slim Float; Glowing Pear-Shaped Float
* Hooks: #14; #12; #10; #8; #4; #2; #1; #1/0; #2/0; #4/0
* Sinkers: 1 3/4 Oz. (50 g ); 3 1/2 Oz. (100 g); Sinker 4 1/4 Oz. (125 g)
* Open Feeders: 2 Oz. (60 g); 4 1/16 Oz. (115 g)
* Closed Feeders: 3 1/2 Oz. (100 g)
* Simple Bells: 2
* Jig Heads: 1/6 Oz. (5 g), #1/0; 1/4 Oz. (7 g), #1; 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #2/0; 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #3/0
* Worms: Worm 12.5 cm (5") (x2); Worm 6" (15 cm)
* Shads: Shad 2" (5 cm) (x3), Shad 3" (7 cm) (x2)
* Spinnerbaits: Spinnerbait 3/4 Oz. (21 g) #3/0 (x2)
* Bass Jigs: Bass Jig 1 Oz. (28 g), #4/0 (x2)
* Spinners: Nano Spinner 1/8 Oz. (4 g), #1 (x2); Barbless Nano Spinner 1/5 Oz. (6 g), #1/0 (x2)
* Spoons: Narrow Spoon 1/4 Oz. (7 g), #1/0 (x2); Single Spoon 1 Oz. (28 g), #2/0 (x2); Single Spoon 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #4/0 (x2)
* TopWater Lures: Popper 1/4 Oz. (7 g), #1/0 (x2); Walker 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #3/0 (x2)
* Crankbaits: Crankbait 3 ft. (1 m), #2/0; Crankbait 12 ft (3.5 m) #2/0; Crankbait 23 ft (7 m) #3/0
* Baits: Red Worms; Maggots; Semolina Balls; Caster Maggots; Bloodworms; Wax Worms; Marshmallows; Yellow Maggots; Small Minnows; Vegetables; Red Maggots; Duck Mussel Meat; Centipedes; Pinkies; Night Crawlers
* Groundbaits: Crimson Cold Water Golden; Active Feeder Golden; Black Roacher Golden; Universal Mixture Golden; Grand Fish Feeder Golden
* Aromas: Molasses Caramelized Golden; Sweet Crucian Golden; Spicy Roach Golden; BigBream Spicy Golden

EQUIPMENT
* GarryScott™ Deluxe Angler Cap - Tackles: 2
* Flaggmann™ Deluxe Angler Jacket - Tackles: 25; Lines: 3
* UL-CHUBER DeluxeBox™ - Tackles: 35; Lines: 3 Chum Components: 10
* Flaggmann™ Deluxe Rod Case - Rods: 5
* UL-CHUBER™ Deluxe Rod Stand - Rod Slot: 3; Stand Count: 1
* GarryScott™ FishFort S Plus Keepnets - Max Single Fish Weight: 77 Lb. (35 kg); Total Fish Weight: 264 Lb. (120 kg); Fish-Friendly: yes

POND PASSES (14 days):
* Lesní Víla Fishery (Czech)
* Mudwater River (Missouri)
* Emerald Lake (New York)
* Rocky Lake (Colorado)
* Neherrin River (North Carolina)
* Ghent–Terneuzen Canal (Netherlands)
* Falcon Lake (Oregon)
* Everglades (Florida)
* White Moose Lake (Alberta)
* Tiber River (Italy)

FISHING LICENSES (14 days):
* Advanced Czech License
* Advanced Missouri License
* Advanced New York License
* Advanced Colorado License
* Advanced North Carolina License
* Advanced Netherlands License
* Advanced Oregon License
* Advanced Florida License
* Advanced Texas License
* Advanced Alberta License
* Advanced Italy License

MONSTER MISSIONS UNLOCK
* Lone Star Mad-Eye Buffalo Monster
* Lesní Víla Perch Bully Monster
* Mudwater Dendrofin Monster
* Rocky Tyrannotrout Monster
* Emerald Pikeslasher Monster
* Neherrin Eldergar Monster
* Ghent-Terneuzen Eel Cannibal Monster
* Falcon Rainbow Outlaw Monster
* Everglades Terror Tarpon Monster
* Tiber Grayling Wrestler Monster
* White Moose Voodoo Fish Monster

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

name: Fishing Planet: Deluxe Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: Skyrocket your angling progress and treat yourself to a truly deluxe fishing experience with the DELUXE FP PACK! The DELUXE FP Pack features SEVEN powerful Deluxe Edition rod and reel combos, along with superb Deluxe Edition fishing apparel!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
